[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=data.txt
actions=header-from;header-mailer

[client10026]
port=10026

[client10027]
port=10027

[header-from]
command=header

name=From
value=kou+sender@cozmixng.org

response=header
n_received=1
status=continue

headers=From;kou+sender@cozmixng.org;;;

[header-mailer]
command=header

name=X-mailer
value=milter-mailer

response=header
n_received=1
status=continue

headers=X-mailer;milter-mailer;;;
